downloadDescription: QFE3 hotfix -  to be applied if a controller is replaced with a new controller with CA version  of  PLX Chip
detailsSection:
QFE3 contains an update to a driver which manages an internal PLX Chip within the Controller (Current version is BA) in StorSimple. The change in the driver is due to the fact that there will be a new version of the PLX chip (new version is CA) that will ship in the appliances from the factory from March onwards.
This hotfix should be applied in a scenario where an appliance with a controller with BA chip needs a controller replacement,  and gets a new controller with the CA chip as a replacement from MSFT
installInstructionSection:
Ensure you have a Microsoft support engineer to help you with the update process  
1. Download the fix (.msu file) as instructed by support engineer to a network path that can be accessible from the appliance .
2. Run below command to install hotfix 
Start-HcsHotfix -Path QFE3HotfixPath
3. Respond to confirmation prompts as applicable 
4. Monitor the update with command 
Get-CauRun
5. See the result of the update by command :- 
get-caureport -last –Detailed
